mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_award ( award_name, award_desc, award_img, point, priority, create_time, last_edit_time, enable_status, shop_id ) VALUE ( #{awardName}, #{awardDesc}, #{awardImg}, #{point}, #{priority}, #{createTime}, #{lastEditTime}, #{enableStatus}, #{shopId} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tb_award WHERE shop_id=#{shopIdCondition} AND award_id=#{awardIdCondition}
mapper.update:
UPDATE tb_award
award_name=#{awardCondition.awardName},
award_desc=#{awardCondition.awardDesc},
award_img=#{awardCondition.awardImg},
point=#{awardCondition.point},
priority=#{awardCondition.priority},
last_edit_time=#{awardCondition.lastEditTime},
enable_status=#{awardCondition.enableStatus}
WHERE award_id=#{awardCondition.awardId} AND shop_id=#{shopIdCondition}
mapper.select: SELECT award_id, award_name, award_desc, award_img, point, priority, create_time, last_edit_time, enable_status, shop_id FROM tb_award WHERE award_id=#{awardId}
